title: Young mother and elderly priest among Tigrayans arrested in Addis Ababa, witnesses say
content:
1. Young mother and elderly priest among Tigrayans arrested in Addis Ababa, witnesses say  CNN
  2. Start your day here: A judge denies Trump's request to block Jan. 6 documents; COP26 delegates release a draft agreement; U.N. staffers are detained in Ethiopia  NPR
  3. UN staff detained in Ethiopia's capital, world body says  Al Jazeera English
  4. Ethiopia Seizes 16 UN Workers Amid Efforts to Halt Tigray War  The New York Times
  5. UN staff, dependents detained in Ethiopia  Reuters
contentSnippet:
Young mother and elderly priest among Tigrayans arrested in Addis Ababa, witnesses say  CNN
Start your day here: A judge denies Trump's request to block Jan. 6 documents; COP26 delegates release a draft agreement; U.N. staffers are detained in Ethiopia  NPR
UN staff detained in Ethiopia's capital, world body says  Al Jazeera English
Ethiopia Seizes 16 UN Workers Amid Efforts to Halt Tigray War  The New York Times
UN staff, dependents detained in Ethiopia  Reuters

localize.title: アディスアベバで逮捕されたティグラヤ人のうち、若い母親と年配の司祭が目撃されています。
目击者称，在亚的斯亚贝巴被捕的提格雷人中有年轻母亲和年长牧师
目擊者稱，在亞的斯亞貝巴被捕的提格雷人中有年輕母親和年長牧師
